articles.title: Einstein Bros. Bagels launches Oktoberfest menu: must-try items
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels has launched a new Oktoberfest menu, available from August 20th until November 4th. The menu includes items like the Oktoberfest Egg Sandwich and Pretzel Bagel Double Dipper, featuring the new Beer Cheese Shmear.

articles.title: Google launches Pixel 10 phones with new artificial intelligence features
articles.author: NBC Bay Area
articles.summary: Google introduced a new line-up of Pixel smartphones. These smartphones are equipped with artificial intelligence. The AI is designed to fetch vital information and improve photos.

articles.title: One-stop robot shop
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: A high-tech district in Beijing opened a Robot Mall, a 4S store, to promote humanoid robots. The store will provide sales, service, spare parts, and surveys for robotics companies, aiding in the commercialization of their products. Robots showcased perform various tasks, including pharmacy shelf stocking and serving drinks.

articles.title: Google unveils latest Pixel 10 phones packed with AI
articles.summary: Google unveiled the new Pixel 10 smartphones starting at US$799, and the Pixel Pro Fold model starting at $1,799. The company also introduced the Pixel Watch 4, a redesigned smartwatch with enhanced fitness tracking and AI capabilities. AI enhancements include Gemini AI assistant integration across devices, enabling features like camera-based assistance and mood-aware responses.

articles.title: Whirlpool washer white. Works good, gc. $175.00 Call 336-675-0466
articles.summary: Whirlpool offers an updated white washer for $175. It is described as working well and in good condition.

articles.title: 35 Unique Products Unlike Any Other
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: EOS launched a limited edition Eos Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Vlasic introduced Pickle Balls, a flavored puff. Nyx released a new "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm made with mochi rice powder.

articles.title: The Made by Google event felt like being sucked into an episode of Wandavision
articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.summary: Google held an event to showcase new products including the Pixel 10 phones, Pixel Watch 4, and Pixel Buds 2A. The event featured Rick Osterloh, Google's senior vice president of devices and services, and was structured more like a live taping of The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon, with segments demonstrating the new gadgets and featuring surprise guests.

articles.title: Zoom Outlines Strategic Plan To ‘Disrupt Itself' At Perspectives 2025
articles.author: Melody Brue
articles.summary: Zoom is pivoting to become an AI-powered work platform, integrating communications, productivity, and customer engagement tools with agentic AI and digital assistants. The company is testing messaging and fine-tuning product updates like AI Companion, Zoom Phone, and Workvivo, ahead of its Zoomtopia event. Zoom is also enhancing its Zoom Up Partner Program and ecosystem integrations to reach new customer segments.

articles.title: OpenAI's New Service Launch in Selected Countries" This title captures the essential details of the article by highlighting the cost and service availability while engaging the reader with a cle
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: OpenAI launched 'ChatGPT Go,' a new subscription service priced at $100 per month, offering enhanced AI content creation capabilities. It features priority access, faster response times, unlimited access to GPT-4, enhanced content length, early access to new features, and dedicated support, making it suitable for businesses, marketers, and individual content creators.

articles.title: Starbucks to close 80-90 locations: Here's which NC stores are on the closure list
articles.author: Citizen Times
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its 'Green Apron Service' initiative nationwide to improve speed, personalization, and hospitality across 11,000 stores. Starbucks will also close 80-90 locations and launch stores exclusively designed for mobile orders and quick pick up without the wait.

articles.title: Google unveils latest Pixel phones packed with AI
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Google unveiled new Pixel 10 smartphones with enhanced artificial intelligence capabilities. The launch event was hosted by Jimmy Fallon in Brooklyn.

articles.title: Google, sorry, but that Pixel event was a cringefest
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 smartphone, emphasizing its AI integration for tasks like photography, texting, and translation. The launch event, hosted by Jimmy Fallon, aimed to showcase these AI-driven features and the phone's overall capabilities. The phone has features like camera and satin finish on edges.

articles.title: Google, sorry, but that Pixel event was a cringefest
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Google launched its Pixel 10 smartphones at a live event, showcasing the integration of AI into features. The event highlighted features such as taking photos, texting friends, translating phone calls, getting help out in the real world. Google's AI assistant Gemini is coming to its augmented reality glasses.

articles.title: Williamson County reporter tours inaugural Bed Bath & Beyond Home store
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond, after closing in 2023, has rebranded as Bed Bath & Beyond Home. The company launched its first store in Brentwood, TN.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 series is here: Prices, specifications, and where to buy?
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold, with prices starting at Rs 79,999. Google also introduced new Pixel accessories, including the Pixel Watch 4 with Wear OS 6 and the Pixel Buds 2a with Active Noise Cancellation, along with Pixel Buds Pro 2.

articles.title: New Balance's 'Comfortable' Fresh Foam Hiking Shoes Are Already $44 Off
articles.summary: New Balance is offering a 23% discount on its Fresh Foam X Hierro Hiker Shoes, reducing the price from $190 to $146. The waterproof hiking shoes feature GORE-TEX fabric and Toe Protect technology, with sizes available for men and women, and free shipping is offered.

articles.title: See inside the new Sprouts grocery store in NoDa
articles.author: Alexandria Sands
org: Second Harvest Food Bank of Metrolina
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market opened a new store at 36th and Tryon streets in NoDa. The store is launching its rewards program for members to earn points on purchases. The store features new innovative products like Khloe Kardashian's protein popcorn, Emma Chamberlain's coffee, and Jennifer Garner's organic baby food.

articles.title: Stanley's cheapest lunch box is just $45 — and this is the one kids want their school lunch packed in
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Stanley has introduced the All Day Mini Lunch Box, a 4.2-quart lunch box designed for school lunches. It retails for $45 and is available in five colors, featuring a crush-proof EVA body, molded EVA insulation, carry handles, a shoulder strap, and a mesh pocket.

articles.title: Nothing's retro-looking Headphone 1 are already $30 off
articles.author: Brandon Russell
articles.summary: Nothing's Headphone 1, first launched in July, are being offered at a discounted price of $269. The headphones feature a retro-transparent design, active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and comfortable ear pads. A roller on the right ear cup controls volume and listening modes, while a paddle button handles track skipping and call management; a customizable button launches voice assistants or enables spatial audio.

articles.title: Google unveils latest Pixel phones packed with AI
articles.author: AFP AFP
articles.summary: Google unveiled new Pixel 10 smartphones featuring enhanced artificial intelligence capabilities. The launch event, held in Brooklyn, was hosted by Jimmy Fallon and featured appearances by The Jonas Brothers and Stephen Curry.

articles.title: This electric scrubber is the secret to cleaning your shower without back pain — nab it for 45% off
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: YKYI has launched the Electric Spin Scrubber, a cordless, rechargeable device designed to simplify cleaning tasks. It features an extendable handle, interchangeable brush heads, and an LED display, offering a convenient and ergonomic cleaning experience.

articles.title: Clinical Trial Insights on Jujube cAMP Extract
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Jujube cAMP is emerging as a breakthrough natural ingredient for food and beverage brands seeking to enhance their products within the booming functional food market. Its science-backed benefits position it as a promising addition to new and existing product formulations.

articles.title: Reviewers Say The Refurbished Kindle Paperwhite 'Looks And Feels Brand New' — And They're 25% Off Right Now
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 26% discount on refurbished Kindle Paperwhite e-readers. The Kindle Paperwhite features include a waterproof design, 12-week battery life, larger display, Bluetooth connectivity, and a thinner design.

articles.title: From PDFs to Creative Tools: Acrobat Studio reimagines the Productivity Hub with AI
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Acrobat Studio, a new platform merging productivity and creativity. It integrates Acrobat, Adobe Express, and AI-driven tools to transform PDFs into interactive knowledge hubs. Users can leverage AI assistants, create content using Express templates, and utilize PDF Spaces for collaborative experiences, enhancing document interaction and content creation.

articles.title: Google's big price cut on Pixel 9 Pro XL after Pixel 10 Pro XL launch, ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series in India. The series includes the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. These smartphones feature upgraded design, performance, and camera capabilities, and are powered by the Tensor G5 chipset.

articles.title: The best new features of the Pixel 10 lineup
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Google has announced its Pixel 10 lineup featuring four devices: Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Key improvements include 'Pixelsnap' magnetic wireless charging, a 5x telephoto lens on the Pixel 10, enhanced dust resistance (IP68) on the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, and AI-powered features like Magic Cue and Camera Coach.

articles.title: First drive impressions: Mazda's refined 2025 CX-60 range
articles.author: Phuti Mpyane
articles.summary: Mazda launched the updated 2025 CX-60 range in July, featuring enhancements to drivability and comfort. The range includes the 2.5l Dynamic, the 2.5l AWD Individual, and the 3.3D Takumi models, all equipped with eight-speed automatic transmissions. The updated model boasts softer springs, revised dampers, recalibrated all-wheel-drive system software, and an expanded exterior color palette including Zircon Sand.

articles.title: Cozy Earth's brand-new linen collection brings a lightweight feel to your bedding lineup
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Cozy Earth has launched its new Linen Collection, a breathable line of lightweight linen fabrics for beds. The collection, made in Portugal from 100% Belgian flax linen, includes a quilt, a duvet cover, and shams, ranging in price from $88 to over $400. It is available in mist and white colors.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Series With Tensor G5 CPU And Gemini AI Camera Announced: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Google unveiled the Pixel 10 series. The company also introduced a new foldable device.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold 5G mobile launched in India at a whopping price of Rs…
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable phone featuring a sleek design, upgraded specifications, and refreshed AI features. The phone includes a Tensor G5 chip, improved displays, a triple camera system, and a 5015mAh battery, with a starting price of Rs. 1,72,999 for the 256GB variant in India.

articles.title: Russell Brown: Can the arrival of a new supermarket supplant old favourites?
articles.author: Russell Brown
articles.summary: Foodstuffs has opened a new 'New World' supermarket in Pt Chevalier. This launch is intended partly to compensate for the closure of 'New World's' Victoria Park branch, which was damaged by fire. The opening affects the existing 'Woolworths' and other local businesses.

articles.title: Something hidden in these sunglasses can help you live in the moment again
articles.author: Jessica Kanzler
articles.summary: AI-powered Smart Sunglasses capture photos and videos with a built-in 1080p camera and dual noise-reducing microphones. They also offer features like object recognition, ChatGPT access, and real-time translation via a companion app. The glasses connect wirelessly to phones and provide blue light filtering for comfortable extended use.

articles.title: Made By Google 2025 Live Event Reveals New Pixel 10 Phones, Watch And Pixel Buds
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: At the Made By Google 2025 event, Google debuted new Pixel 10 phones, a Pixel Watch, and new earbuds. The event showcased what's new in Google's product lineup.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Just Solved Foldables' Biggest Problem
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold incorporates several industry-first features. Its IP rating for dust resistance stands out as a significant advancement.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 lineup – 5 key upgrades including Pixelsnap, Tensor G5, and Camera Coach
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google announced the Pixel 10 lineup. The Pixel 10 lineup includes five key features.

articles.title: essoc Voted Best No Show Socks for Its Stay-Put Comfort and Design
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: essoc's no-show socks have been voted the best in a consumer poll and industry analysis, reflecting the brand's commitment to comfort, innovation, and inclusivity. The company designed socks that stay in place and feel like a second skin, utilizing proprietary silicone grip technology, ergonomic fit, and breathable fabric. essoc is planning to expand its range of materials and styles.

articles.title: Microsoft hints at
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to release a more affordable version of its Xbox Cloud Gaming service. This hints at a new service tier being introduced by Microsoft.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Colors: See All 4 Vibrant Finishes
articles.author: theshortcut.com
articles.summary: Google announced the Pixel 10 at an event in New York. The device features an extra rear camera, the Tensor G5 processor, and a bigger battery. It is available in four vibrant finishes.

articles.title: This Google Pixel 10 feature is more important than any other – and you might have missed it!
articles.author: Sam Cross
articles.summary: Google has unveiled the Pixel 10 range, which includes the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold with Qi2 charging and introduces 'Content Credentials' to smartphones for the first time. This feature, embedded in the device and viewable in Google Photos, validates image authenticity by confirming they are not AI-generated.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pre Orders Open in UK with a Surprisingly Low Price From £14
articles.summary: Google unveiled the Pixel 10 family, its new smartphone line for 2025, featuring four versions including the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. All versions are available for pre-order.

articles.title: FastBots Launches Knowledge Sources: A Breakthrough in Customer Service Chatbots
articles.summary: FastBots.ai launched Knowledge Sources, a new feature allowing businesses to create customer service chatbots using uploaded data, ChatGPT, and real-time internet search. The new Knowledge Sources feature combines proprietary data with AI intelligence, live web information, and third-party software actions. It is available on all paid FastBots plans.

articles.title: SEO in 2025: How Link Building Services Drive Answer Engine Optimization
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Adxom introduces a link building marketplace designed for speed, clarity, and quality, connecting buyers directly with vetted publishers. This platform aims to improve SEO and AEO by providing features such as publisher transparency, advanced filters, direct collaboration, end-to-end management, and strict quality checks. It helps businesses build strong backlinks that support both SEO and AEO.

articles.title: Dyson's fan-favorite V11 Extra cordless vacuum is now $130 off
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has announced a limited-time price reduction on its V11 Extra cordless vacuum, bringing the price down from $629.99 to $499.99. The V11 Extra is designed for whole-home cleaning and offers up to 60 minutes of fade-free suction, an LED display for real-time tracking, and specialized tools.

articles.title: Stung by Performance Drops: Customers Fume Over Subscription-Model Horsepower in Cars
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: BMW has introduced horsepower subscriptions for models like the i7 and i5, allowing customers to unlock additional engine power via monthly fees. Porsche has also explored similar subscription models for its Macan EV, offering performance boosts as optional subscriptions. Hyundai and Genesis are also considering subscription models for various vehicle features.

articles.title: We just tried all of Google's new Pixel devices
articles.summary: Google is launching its new Pixel lineup, featuring noise-canceling earbuds and iPhone-like features. The new Pixel devices also include an AI-powered camera mode.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: I compared both flagships, and here's who wins
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable phone with an IP68 dust resistance rating. The new phone is being compared to the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold also allows users to retain their iPhone's MagSafe-compatible accessories.

articles.title: 5 AI features on the Pixel 10 that Google thinks will win you over (including the Fold)
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google launched its Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10 Pro, Fold, Watch 4, and Buds 2a. The new phones come with AI features like photo editing with speech, language translation using your voice, and smarter prediction of users' needs powered by the Google Tensor G5. The Pixel 10 Series also includes a one-year subscription to the Google AI Pro plan.

articles.title: Champion Breweries to Acquire Bullet Energy Drink from Sun Mark
articles.author: Modupe Gbadeyanka
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria has launched Airtel Assist, a WhatsApp-based self-service chatbot, to provide real-time customer support. This AI-powered tool allows customers to manage their accounts, make payments, and troubleshoot issues directly within WhatsApp. Airtel Assist is designed to improve customer accessibility and service delivery.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Just Solved Foldables' Biggest Problem
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 lineup includes the new Pixel 10 Pro Fold, which is the first book-style foldable phone with dust resistance (IP68 rating). This feature allows users to use the phone in environments with dust and particles without worrying about damaging the device, setting it apart from previous models and some competitors like Samsung.

articles.title: The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold is the first fully dust-resistant foldable
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable phone with an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, a new gear-less hinge design, and a narrower front panel. The phone features the Tensor G5 chip, Qi2 support (Pixelsnap), and comes in moonstone and jade colors, going on sale on October 9th with preorders starting immediately.

articles.title: The newest Pixels put generative AI right inside the camera
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro and Pro XL introduce Pro Res Zoom, a feature utilizing generative AI to enhance photos taken at high zoom levels (up to 100x). This latent diffusion model aims to provide usable images where previously the results were poor. Photos taken with Pro Res Zoom get tagged using C2PA content credentials as edited with AI tools.

articles.title: Google beats Samsung with impressive new Android phone - just don't look at the price
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable device with IP68 water and dust resistance. It features a faster Tensor G5 processor, a brighter 8-inch main panel, and a 6.4-inch front panel. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold will be available for pre-order today and hits shelves on October 9, priced at £1,749.

articles.title: Prudential, Standard Chartered Celebrate 25-year Partnership With Launch Of New Products
articles.author: Malaysian National News Agency
articles.summary: Prudential and Standard Chartered celebrated their 25-year partnership by launching new products. This launch occurred on August 20, 2025, in Kuala Lumpur.

articles.title: After Disastrous GPT-5, Sam Altman Pivots to Hyping Up GPT-6
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its GPT-5 AI model, which received mixed reactions. CEO Sam Altman is already discussing GPT-6, promising improved memory and user preference understanding. OpenAI is also starting a brain-computer interface company to rival Neuralink.

articles.title: Amazon's next tablet might run Android
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing to launch a new, higher-end Android tablet as early as next year. This tablet could give users access to a wider variety of Android features and apps, and might cost around $400. Amazon also plans to launch cheaper tablets with the Linux-based Vega operating system.

articles.title: Baby shower gifts: Top products for expecting families
articles.author: Rita Demontis
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new products for expecting families. These include the Angelcare Baby Bath Support, Berest Sleeping Families White Noise Machine, Multi-Function Waterproof Travel Backpack, Lululemon New Parent Backpack, Momcozy M9 Hands Free Breast Pump, and the Nanit Pro Camera, among other baby care items. These products are available from retailers like Amazon and Walmart.

articles.title: The £36 moisturiser picking up awards for skin barrier repair
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser Intense, priced at £36, is available at drsambunting.com and is recognized for its potential in skin barrier repair and hydration. Manuka Doctor's Manuka honey, endorsed by Dr Hilary Jones, offers natural immunity support. Raylo Business provides leasing services for tech devices, like iPhones and MacBooks, with monthly payments starting from £2.49 for smartphones and £7.49 for iPads.

articles.title: A Decade of Innovation: VAPORESSO Constantly Breaks Through the Infinite Possibilities of Technology
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: VAPORESSO is launching iMate OS, a modular design vaping platform featuring a magnetic structure for easy battery separation and cross-category compatibility. In Q4, VAPORESSO will also launch its next-generation COSS with an intelligent auto-refilling system and enhanced features, designed to improve the vaping experience.

articles.title: FLUENT Corp. Announces Exclusive Cultivation Partnership with Connected Cannabis at New Facility in Buffalo, New York
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Connected Cannabis, AlienLabs and Smoken Promises branded products will be distributed.

articles.title: The Pixel 9 Pro Is Great (If You Ignore the AI)
articles.author: Michelle Ehrhardt
articles.summary: Google is introducing the Pixel 9 line of smartphones, featuring models like the Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL and a foldable Pixel 9 Pro Fold. A new feature called Add Me uses local processing to stitch two photos together so nobody has to miss out on being in a shot.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Aug 20, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Bertolli released Dress & Drizz extra-virgin olive oil in a squeeze bottle. Vital Proteins launched Collagen & Protein Shake. Fly By Jing introduced Chili Crisp Ketchup. Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day launched a Blueberry Scent Collection. Dove introduced its first-ever Women's Wellness line. Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Vitamin C Serum. Danone's Activia introduced Activia Proactive Probiotic Yogurt. Method launched Dream Foam Foaming Body Wash. Barilla added Fusilloni and Orecchiette to Al Bronzo pasta collection.

articles.title: A Decade of Innovation: VAPORESSO Constantly Breaks Through the Infinite Possibilities of Technology
articles.author: VAPORESSO
articles.summary: VAPORESSO, celebrating its 10th anniversary, is introducing a unique, industry-first technology. The company is also unveiling a revolutionary advancement intended to reshape the perception of vaping.

articles.title: Is a Canon camera phone incoming?
articles.author: Kalum Carter
articles.summary: Canon's patent filing suggests the company is preparing to enter the camera phone market with a device capable of recording video and stills simultaneously through different lenses. This proposed smartphone could target content creators and mobile filmmakers, potentially disrupting the mobile and camera industries.

articles.title: Kuse.ai's Debut Secures Product Hunt's Product of the Day and 10 Million Global Views
articles.summary: Kuse.ai launched its visual AI workspace, which uses Visual Context Engineering, and secured Product Hunt's Product of the Day. The company generated $9 million ARR without venture capital funding or paid advertising. Kuse.ai also introduced a flexible payment model with per-seat subscriptions and shared credit pools.

articles.title: The best dorm-friendly appliances for small spaces
articles.summary: Nespresso introduced the Vertuo Pop+, a compact coffee machine. Ninja launched the Air Fryer Pro 4-in-1 with air fry, roast, reheat, and dehydrate settings. Hatch released the Restore 3 Alarm Clock designed to improve sleep quality. Breville launched the Fresh & Furious Blender with one-touch programs. Everyday Essentials offers 2-Slice Toaster, and Dyson offers Purifier Hot + Cold Air Purifier.

articles.title: The best dorm-friendly appliances for small spaces
articles.author: Vicki Duong
articles.summary: Nespresso introduces the Vertuo Pop+, a compact coffee machine delivering café-style coffee. Ninja unveils the Air Fryer Pro 4-in-1, an appliance for air frying, roasting, reheating, and dehydrating. Hatch launches the Restore 3 Alarm Clock, designed for gentle wake-ups and calming wind-downs. Also, a two-slice toaster and Dyson purifier were introduced as affordable and compact dorm-friendly product options.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 might trick you into believing you'll get a killer display, but beware of the downgrade
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: OnePlus is potentially developing the OnePlus 15 with an upgraded display featuring a higher refresh rate, though it may have a lower 1.5K resolution. The device might also include a new performance engine and a new 'Moon Rock Black' color option.

articles.title: Nifty New Aldi Laundry Accessory Will Make Chores a Breeze
articles.author: Magdalena Becker
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new product under its Easy Home brand called the Divided Laundry Basket. Priced at $9.99, this hamper features a removable divider to simplify laundry sorting, separating whites from colors before washing. This product aims to reduce the time and effort associated with pre-wash laundry sorting.

articles.title: Jaimit Doshi launches AI-driven marketing startup Metuzi.ai
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 20
articles.summary: Jaimit Doshi launched Metuzi.ai, an AI-driven platform focused on consumer engagement and personalized marketing. The platform uses custom large language models to analyze consumer behavior and deliver targeted communication, with performance-led pricing. Netcore Cloud has joined as the lead investor through its incubation program.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 series launch today: Check features, specifications, expected price in India
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series, including Pixel 10, Pro, Pro XL, and Pro Fold models. Details regarding prices are available.

articles.title: New smartphone with key feature blocking kids seeing explicit content online launches tonight
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Vodafone will release a new smartphone at 5pm tonight. This marks the introduction of a new product offering by the company.

articles.title: Chinese ‘Virtual Human' Salespeople Are Outperforming Their Real Human Counterparts
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Baidu and DeepSeek are using AI technology to create virtual livestreamers. These livestreamers operate 24/7 selling products like wet wipes and printers.

articles.title: Centric PLM Serves Up New Innovations for the Food & Beverage and Grocery Industry to Drive Efficiency & Speed
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: Centric Software unveils the latest evolution of its market-leading Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) platform, Centric PLM™. The updated platform includes powerful AI-driven features and a breakthrough compliance engine. Centric Software delivers integrated enterprise solutions to manage consumer goods products.

articles.title: HUAWEI MatePad 11.5: A Captivating Study Companion with Student-Friendly Features, Now Available for Pre-Order
articles.summary: HUAWEI launched the MatePad 11.5, a new tablet featuring a PaperMatte Display and targeted towards students and young professionals. The tablet is available for pre-order and includes features like PC-level WPS Office, a detachable keyboard, and the GoPaint digital painting app. It also boasts a 10,100 mAh battery with 40W SuperCharge technology.

articles.title: Prost to Pretzels! Einstein Bros. Bagels Launches Seasonal Oktoberfest Menu
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels is introducing a new Oktoberfest menu starting August 20th. The menu features the Oktoberfest Egg Sandwich, made with Pretzel Bagel, Beer Cheese Shmear, and other ingredients, along with the Pretzel Bagel Double Dipper and Beer Cheese Shmear. These items are available for a limited time in-bakery, online, and through the Einstein Bros. Bagels app.

articles.title: Virtualplatform unveils white-label app for ISPs & partners
articles.author: IT Brief Australia
articles.summary: Virtualplatform has launched a white-label mobile app. The app enables ISPs and partners to manage customer lifecycles with branded, mobile-first service and billing tools.

articles.title: Lyken.AI, Launches Corporate Website Ahead of Scale-Up
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Alset AI Ventures Inc. has launched a new corporate website for Lyken.AI, its flagship cloud compute platform. The new website is intended to drive customer engagement, support the sales pipeline, and showcase AI infrastructure solutions.

articles.title: Lyken.AI, Launches Corporate Website Ahead of Scale-Up
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: A company is launching a new website. This website is intended to drive customer engagement and support the sales pipeline. The website will also showcase AI infrastructure solutions.

articles.title: Pepsi showcasing new "Drips" flavors at Regal movie theaters. In other news, PepsiCo is still trying to make the brand "Starry" a thing
articles.summary: Pepsi introduced Starry after the company lost the trademark for Sierra Mist.

articles.title: 24 of the best gifts for teen girlsfor every interest and budget
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Fitbit launched Fitbit Charge 4 with features like a heart rate monitor and sleep tracking. Revlon's One-Step hairdryer and volumizer hot brush became popular. Anker introduced Nebula Capsule projector. Foreo released Luna 2 cleansing device that removes dirt. Buffy introduced an eco-friendly comforter and Amazon sells Echo Dot as alarm clock. Beats Solo3 headphones provide long battery life.

articles.title: Checkers Rolls Out South Africa's First-Ever 'Smart Trolley': Here's How It Works
articles.author: The South African
articles.summary: Checkers, in South Africa, has launched a pilot program introducing the Xpress Trolley, a smart shopping trolley designed to provide a frictionless and queue-free in-store shopping experience. This initiative is spearheaded by Shoprite Group's innovation division, ShopriteX.

articles.title: 28 Hair Care Products For Summer Damage
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article highlights various hair care products aimed at addressing summer-related hair damage. Noteworthy mentions include the Olaplex No. 5 conditioner, Color Wow hair masque, Redken bonding leave-in conditioner, BioSilk and the Cécred reconstructing mask. These products offer solutions for hydration, repair, color revival, and overall hair health, helping users restore and maintain their hair's quality post-summer.

articles.title: Astonish: Bradford-based household cleaning products giant reports strong year
articles.author: Greg Wright
articles.summary: Astonish, a cleaning products manufacturer, experienced double-digit revenue growth driven by innovation. The company invested in infrastructure and automated production, leading to the development of new household and personal care products. Astonish plans to deepen ties with retail partners and reinforce its market position by championing eco-friendly, high-performance products.

articles.title: ShengShu Technology Announces Updates to Vidu's Model-as-a-Service (MaaS) API, with Lip Sync, Templates, and MCP
articles.summary: ShengShu Technology upgraded its Vidu MaaS API, bringing avatar-driven content to e-commerce and advertising. The new release enables brands to launch cinematic campaigns with built-in lip-sync, creative templates, and MCP integration, supporting 60+ languages. Vidu now also generates 48 kHz HD sound effects and background music in sync with visual content.

articles.title: MystoreNEXT: Revolutionizing India's Digital Commerce Landscape
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Mystore, India's leading open network marketplace, has launched MystoreNEXT, a new commerce platform that offers brands and SMEs a unified digital ecosystem. This platform integrates logistics, payments, and marketing into a single solution and provides features such as branded storefronts and AI-driven tools.

articles.title: Pizza Hut Drops Artisanal Options That Are Guaranteed to Elevate Pizza Night
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Pizza Hut has introduced Crafted Flatzz, a new personal pizza, in the U.S. and 20 other countries. Crafted Flatzz comes in five U.S. options including Nashville Hot Chicken and Pepperoni Duo and offers adult-focused flavors at a lower price before 5 p.m. The company CEO, Aaron Powell, says that Crafted Flatzz represent their largest simultaneous global menu innovation.

articles.title: Pudu Robotics Launches PUDU MT1 Max: AI-Powered 3D Perception Robotic Sweeper for Complex Large-Scale Environments
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Pudu Robotics launched the PUDU MT1 Max, an AI-powered 3D Perception Robotic Sweeper, designed for expansive and complex cleaning scenarios. The MT1 Max features next-generation 3D spatial perception, enhanced AI intelligence, and upgraded safety systems, making it suitable for large-scale indoor and semi-outdoor cleaning.

articles.title: Hoover's robot vacuum that 'picks up everything' drops £130 with this code
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Hoover has reduced the price of its Robot Vacuum Cleaner to £119.  The robot vacuum uses lasers for navigation and features a rotating brush for sweeping dirt. Hoover also offers a 2-in-1 Robot vacuum and mop combo, which retails for £299, offering both vacuuming and mopping functionality.

articles.author: 스토리 히치하이커
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. will introduce 25 new appliances, including refrigerators and washing machines, tailored to European consumers at IFA 2025. The new lineup focuses on energy efficiency and eco-friendliness, featuring innovations like redesigned structures for better cold air preservation and AI-driven optimization of usage patterns. Additionally, LG is introducing new app-based services and accessibility features through the ThinQ app and the 'LG Comfort Kit' for elderly and disabled customers.

articles.title: Digital over metal, one in three Hyundai owners opts for virtual keys
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor India has introduced a 'Digital Key' feature, enabling smartphone-based car access, initially on ALCAZAR and CRETA Electric models, and plans to expand it to other models such as Creta ICE, next-gen Venue and Verna. Currently, 33% of Hyundai's customers have chosen this feature, which utilizes NFC technology and the Hyundai BlueLink app for vehicle control and key sharing.

articles.title: NYX's new Wednesday range features a 'mysterious' £9 colour changing lip oil
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: NYX has launched its new 'Wednesday' makeup collection, inspired by the Netflix show, featuring eight affordable beauty buys. The service includes options like a basic wash for $10 per wash or $20 per month, and a 'zest wash' for $18 per wash or $35 per month, with additional discounts for families adding more vehicles. Clementine's is a new venture by the grandson of the founder of Thomas Car Wash and offers a completely different service model.

This new tier is designed to target casual gamers, expand market reach, and compete with rivals like Nvidia GeForce Now and PlayStation Plus Premium. The launch of this new tier is anticipated in late 2025.

For example, a fintech brand launching a new product can benefit from this streamlined process.
